channel.title: R on Biranjan
channel.description: Recent content in R on Biranjan

item.title: Making Twitter Bot with R
item.description: I was just playing with Twitter API so that I could automatically like Tweets from certain twitter account (for example twitter account of my workplace). And then I realized you can do quite more than just like the tweet. You can re-tweet the tweet, follow people, send messages and lot more. In this post I am going to show the basics of how to set-up the twitter automation and you can add your own tricks on top of my basic scripts.

item.title: How to take your predictive model to next Level using Shiny
item.description: Building a predictive model must be one of the usual task for students to do in their machine learning or predictive modelling class.However, when I was student I often had lingering question what to do with model now ? In this post I will talk about how to take your predictive model to the next level and make a web app where other people can interact with your model. The final outcome will look like this.
